title: Corda Evm Processor Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the evm processor section.

maxRetryAttempts.description: The maximum number of times the Evm processor retries a transient error before failing. A value of zero disables retries.

maxRetryWindowDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds after a transient error that Corda retries a flow before failing it. A value of zero disables retries.

maxRetryDelay.description: The maximum delay in milliseconds before Corda schedules a retry.

threadPoolSize.description: The number of threads to concurrently execute evm calls.
